description:
Chess For Two brings the ancient game of chess to your HP TouchPad tablet, with the following features:

- Play a game of chess against a friend.
- Option to validate all moves, including en-passant captures, castling and promotions.
- Option to show all squares the selected piece can go (great for those learning the game)
- Optional use of the touch-move rule.
- Detection of check mate and stale mate positions.
- Optional rotation of the pieces to face the player that moves.

And this is just the beginning, we are planning a number of additions in the near future, like the addition of a game clock for tournament play, different board colors and piece styles, etc.

We'd love to hear your suggestions as well, please write a review and let us know what you'd like to see in future versions of the app!
